conclusion: Determine work done by gas from state D to A.
Transition from D to A is isobaric at pressure p1, shown by horizontal line in PV diagram.
Volume decreases from V2 to V1; change in volume is V2 - V1.
Work done in isobaric process is W = p Î”V.
Since volume decreases, V1 - V2 is negative, indicating negative work.
Work done by gas from D to A is W = p1 (V1 - V2), indicating work is done on the gas.
